name: Building Construction Puzzle
description:
A fun adventure begins!
Small funny animals decided to build a city, but they need the help of an experienced builder and architect! Each fluffy wants the most beautiful and interesting house and asks you to start building more quickly from blocks.
Choose from a variety of bright cubes- colorful blocks, stairs, doors and windows, roofs and columns - the best to build a dream house for a cute little animal.
Your task is to build houses from cubes, fulfill orders your customers, improve the skills of the builder and pass all levels of skill from the Trainee to the Architect.
To play in “Building Construction Puzzle” is very simple: go to the construction site, choose the necessary blocks and do not forget to check with the project! If you do everything right, customers will be happy and you will be one step closer to your goal! Also a successful builder is waiting for prizes!
Download right now, build a whole city of cubes and show your skills as a builder and architect!
Please note: the application is available for download free, but also contains paid content.

Features of construction from blocks for children:
- more than 20 cheerful animals;
- three levels of complexity of the game about the construction of houses: Trainee, Builder and Architect;
- 60+ levels for the development of memory and attention;
- open new levels and get new blocks;
- a large selection of colorful building materials: blocks for walls, roofs, doors, windows, arches and much more;
- simple control - suitable for children;
- “Building Construction Puzzle” is a fun game for children and adults.
